title: boots of swiftness buff
body:
I know that boots of swiftness reduce the effectiveness of slows by 25%. but noone ever gets them because being slowed 37.5% instead of 50 really isn't worth it, even with the 15 movespeed  and being relatively cheap. why can't these useless boots actually give something decent like move though units or 50% reduced slow duration or a remove slows active.

I can think of maybe 3 champs i would ever get swiftness on and even then it would be situational
-singed
-garen
-nasus

replies.body:
I take Swiftness on {{champion:62}} most often when I really don't think I'm in any danger of being ridiculously harassed or of dying and if I deal relatively high damage. It's great for chasing people down during combat (with Furor). And makes my clone more effective.
Other wise, Tabi for AA/AD based or Treads for AP and High CC.

any jungler that gets juggernaut....

bam. get swifties.
